pages.title: The Soulbook
pages.text: The $(item)Soulbook$() is used for essence storage. A soulbook can contain up to the exact number of essence required in order to complete a 'soul' of that type.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: To craft a soulbook, simply combine a book with ender dust. The dust turns the book into a soul container, as it will cause any essence to congeal to the surface of the book's pages and cover.

An empty soulbook is as useless as an empty book. That is: it has a singular use, being filled.$(p)To fill a soulbook, craft it with essence of a single type. For example, crafting it with chicken essence would cause its alignment to change to that of the chicken. As the soulbook comes closer to containing a full soul, its colour will shift towards that of the essence it contains.
